/usr/local/bin/mpicxx -fPIC -std=c++11 -m64 -pthread -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -m64 -shared -Wl,-soname,libadios2_c_mpi.so.2 -o ../../lib/libadios2_c_mpi.so.2.7.1 CMakeFiles/adios2_c_mpi.dir/adios2/c/adios2_c_adios_mpi.cpp.o CMakeFiles/adios2_c_mpi.dir/adios2/c/adios2_c_io_mpi.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/omar/WORK/OpenFOAM/OpenFOAM-v2206/ThirdParty-v2206/build/linux64Gcc/ADIOS2-2.7.1/lib: ../../lib/libadios2_c.so.2.7.1 ../../lib/libadios2_core_mpi.so.2.7.1 ../../lib/libadios2_core.so.2.7.1 -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/omar/WORK/OpenFOAM/OpenFOAM-v2206/ThirdParty-v2206/build/linux64Gcc/ADIOS2-2.7.1/lib
